languages.text: "А что?" {n}— зло и горько восклицает офицер. Кажется, будто внутри него рухнула какая-то плотина, не дававшая ходу эмоциям.{/n} "Корабль в руинах, каждый второй офицер убит! А эт{mf|от|а}-то желторот{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан нас куда заведет?!"

traits.locale_text: "А что?" {n}— зло и горько восклицает офицер. Кажется, будто внутри него рухнула какая-то плотина, не дававшая ходу эмоциям.{/n} "Корабль в руинах, каждый второй офицер убит! А эт{mf|от|а}-то желторот{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан нас куда заведет?!"

languages.text: "So what?" {n}comes the officer's hostile and bitter reply. It is as if a dam has burst inside and all his pent-up emotions are rushing out of him.{/n} "The ship's in ruins! Every second officer's dead! And now we've got a green Lord Captain who's supposed to lead us to void knows where!"
languages.original_text: "А что?" {n}— зло и горько восклицает офицер. Кажется, будто внутри него рухнула какая-то плотина, не дававшая ходу эмоциям.{/n} "Корабль в руинах, каждый второй офицер убит! А эт{mf|от|а}-то желторот{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан нас куда заведет?!"

traits.locale_text: "So what?" comes the officer's hostile and bitter reply. It is as if a dam has burst inside and all his pent-up emotions are rushing out of him.{n} "The ship's in ruins! Every second officer's dead! And now we've got a green Lord Captain who's supposed to lead us to void knows where!"

"So what?" comes the officer's hostile and bitter reply. It is as if a dam has burst inside and all his pent-up emotions are rushing out of him.{n} "The ship's in ruins! Every second officer's dead! And now we've got a green Lord Captain who's supposed to lead us to void knows where!"

"So what?" comes the officer's hostile and bitter reply. It is as if a dam has burst inside and all his pent-up emotions are rushing out of him.{n} "The ship's in ruins! Every second officer's dead! And now we've got a green Lord Captain who's supposed to lead us to void knows where!"

"So what?" {n}comes the officer's hostile and bitter reply. It is as if a dam has burst inside and all his pent-up emotions are rushing out of him.{/n} "The ship's in ruins! Every second officer's dead! And now we've got a green Lord Captain who's supposed to lead us to void knows where!"

languages.text: “那又怎么样？”{n}这位军官的回答充满了敌意与苦涩，仿佛内心的堤坝已经崩塌，所有压抑的情绪都释放了出来。{/n}“这艘船已经完蛋了！所有二副都死光了！现在又来了个菜鸟船长，天知道这个人会把我们带到什么地方去！”
languages.original_text: "So what?" {n}comes the officer's hostile and bitter reply. It is as if a dam has burst inside and all his pent-up emotions are rushing out of him.{/n} "The ship's in ruins! Every second officer's dead! And now we've got a green Lord Captain who's supposed to lead us to void knows where!"

traits.locale_text: “那又怎么样？”这位军官的回答充满了敌意与苦涩，仿佛内心的堤坝已经崩塌，所有压抑的情绪都释放了出来。{n}“这艘船已经完蛋了！所有二副都死光了！现在又来了个菜鸟船长，天知道这个人会把我们带到什么地方去！”

languages.text: 「それで？」{n}士官は、敵意のこもった返答を返す。まるで心の中の堰が決壊し、溜め込まれていた感情が一気に噴出したかのようだった。{/n}「この船はもう終わりだ！副官は皆死んだ！そして今我々のもとにいるのは、我々をどこへ導くのかもわからない未熟なロード・キャプテンだけだ！」
languages.original_text: "So what?" {n}comes the officer's hostile and bitter reply. It is as if a dam has burst inside and all his pent-up emotions are rushing out of him.{/n} "The ship's in ruins! Every second officer's dead! And now we've got a green Lord Captain who's supposed to lead us to void knows where!"

traits.locale_text: 「それで？」{n}士官は、敵意のこもった返答を返す。まるで心の中の堰が決壊し、溜め込まれていた感情が一気に噴出したかのようだった。{/n}「この船はもう終わりだ！副官は皆死んだ！そして今我々のもとにいるのは、我々をどこへ導くのかもわからない未熟なロード・キャプテンだけだ！」

languages.text: "Na und?", {n}antwortet der Offizier feindselig und verbittert, als wäre in ihm ein Damm gebrochen und alle aufgestauten Emotionen stürzten nun aus ihm heraus.{/n} "Das Schiff ist hinüber! Die Hälfte der Offiziere ist tot! Und jetzt haben wir auch noch einen unerfahrenen Lord Captain, der uns weiß die Leere wohin führen soll!"
languages.original_text: "So what?" {n}comes the officer's hostile and bitter reply. It is as if a dam has burst inside and all his pent-up emotions are rushing out of him.{/n} "The ship's in ruins! Every second officer's dead! And now we've got a green Lord Captain who's supposed to lead us to void knows where!"

traits.locale_text: "Na und?", antwortet der Offizier feindselig und verbittert, als wäre in ihm ein Damm gebrochen und alle aufgestauten Emotionen stürzten nun aus ihm heraus.{n} "Das Schiff ist hinüber! Die Hälfte der Offiziere ist tot! Und jetzt haben wir auch noch einen unerfahrenen Lord Captain, der uns weiß die Leere wohin führen soll!"

languages.text: « Sinon quoi ? », {n}répond sèchement l'officier. Comme après la rupture d'une digue, ses émotions refoulées éclatent au grand jour.{/n} « Le vaisseau est en ruine ! La moitié des officiers sont morts ! Et pour couronner le tout, cette bleusaille de seigneur-capitaine est censée nous guider je ne sais où ! »
languages.original_text: "So what?" {n}comes the officer's hostile and bitter reply. It is as if a dam has burst inside and all his pent-up emotions are rushing out of him.{/n} "The ship's in ruins! Every second officer's dead! And now we've got a green Lord Captain who's supposed to lead us to void knows where!"

traits.locale_text: « Sinon quoi ? », répond sèchement l'officier. Comme après la rupture d'une digue, ses émotions refoulées éclatent au grand jour.{n} « Le vaisseau est en ruine ! La moitié des officiers sont morts ! Et pour couronner le tout, cette bleusaille de seigneur-capitaine est censée nous guider je ne sais où ! »

languages.text: «¿Para qué?», {n}responde el oficial, hostil y amargado. Es como si se hubiera roto un dique en su interior y sus emociones acumuladas salieran a borbotones.{/n} «¡La nave está en la ruina! ¡La mitad de los oficiales están muertos! ¡Y ahora tenemos a un{mf| |a} Lord Capitán novat{mf|o|a} para llevarnos a una región perdida de la mano del Emperador!».
languages.original_text: "So what?" {n}comes the officer's hostile and bitter reply. It is as if a dam has burst inside and all his pent-up emotions are rushing out of him.{/n} "The ship's in ruins! Every second officer's dead! And now we've got a green Lord Captain who's supposed to lead us to void knows where!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Para qué?», responde el oficial, hostil y amargado. Es como si se hubiera roto un dique en su interior y sus emociones acumuladas salieran a borbotones.{n} «¡La nave está en la ruina! ¡La mitad de los oficiales están muertos! ¡Y ahora tenemos a un{mf| |a} Lord Capitán novat{mf|o|a} para llevarnos a una región perdida de la mano del Emperador!».

languages.text: "Aşarsam ne olur?" {n}Subay, düşmanca ve sertçe cevap veriyor. İçinde bir baraj patlamış da bastırdığı tüm duyguları dışarı fırlamış gibi.{/n} "Gemi harabeye döndü! Subayların yarısı öldü! Elimizde kala kala bizi uçsuz bilir nereye götürecek çömez bir Lord Kaptan kaldı!"
languages.original_text: "So what?" {n}comes the officer's hostile and bitter reply. It is as if a dam has burst inside and all his pent-up emotions are rushing out of him.{/n} "The ship's in ruins! Every second officer's dead! And now we've got a green Lord Captain who's supposed to lead us to void knows where!"

traits.locale_text: "Aşarsam ne olur," {n}diye düşmanca ve sert bir cevap veriyor subay. İçinde bir baraj patlamış da bastırdığı tüm duyguları dışarı fırlamış gibi.{/n} "Gemi harabeye döndü! Subayların yarısı öldü! Elimizde kala kala bizi uçsuz bilir nereye götürecek çömez bir Lord Kaptan kaldı!"
